message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I understand you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $100. How about $105?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $98?
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll give you a bit more room to breathe. How about $102?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob! I'll meet you at $97, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $92. This is my final offer.
